page.title: 04LORD LICHFIELD'S LIFE
page.content: The family has Shugborough and 3 other homes in London,Scotland and the West Indies They use Shugborough for some holidays and at weekends. Lord Lichfield is very active in local and county organisations. He and Lady Leonora attend as many local functions as their busy schedules allow them to. Lord Lichfield enjoys motorcycling and fishing.He has planted over 1,500 trees. The family spend much time walking or riding on Cannock Chase. He frequently visits the local pub. His wife loves shopping in London. They are very devoted to their children who go to school in London. He showed us the tadpoles he had fished out of the river for his son. His greatest ambition is to have a happy family for as long as possible.
